author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Make the additional Run3 files as step 1 to make the payload for Run3. All these files are needed to make the payload

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Need to be back ported to CMSSW_13_0_X
title: Run3-gex155 Make the additional Run3 files as the step1 to make the payload for Run3
